property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: Title displayed on the chat component card.

property.name: agentDeveloperName
property.label: Agent Developer Name
property.description: (Optional) Specify the exact Developer Name of the AI Agent to use. If left blank, the system will route to an appropriate agent automatically.

property.name: enableStartOver
property.label: Enable 'Start Over From Here' Feature
property.description: FOR TESTING ONLY. If enabled, users with the correct permission can delete a user message and all subsequent messages to test a different conversation path.

property.name: useCommunityMode
property.label: Use Community Mode
property.description: Set to true when deploying in Experience Cloud/Community environments. Leave false for Lightning Experience.
